actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2119 of title 18, United States Code, to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2119 of title 18, United States Code, to make carjacking a Federal offense without regard to whether the offense is committed with the use of a firearm and to authorize imposition of the death penalty if death results from commission of the offense.
